name: Sleeping with the Enemy Quiz for Experts |   Movies

questions.text: Who played the role of Martin Burney?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Bergin.

	Patrick Bergin got his start in the 1988 film "Taffin" that also co-starred Pierce Brosnan.  He can also be seen in "Patriot Games" (1992) opposite Harrison Ford.

questions.text: When Martin and Laura returned from the party what kind of fruit did she drop on the kitchen floor?
questions.explanation:
Strawberries.

	She asked Martin if he was hungry and he decided he was hungry for her instead of the food.

questions.text: Elizabeth Lawrence, who played Laura's mother Chloe Williams, was on what popular daytime soap opera in the 1980s?
questions.explanation:
All My Children.

	Elizabeth portrayed Myra Murdock Sloane on "All My Children" from 1979-1991.  She was Palmer Courtlandt's house keeper.  She also played characters on "The Guiding Light", "The Doctors", and "As the World Turns".

questions.text: Where did Laura learn how to swim?
questions.explanation:
YWCA.

	She took lessons behind Martin's back because she knew there would be a time when he would not be looking and she could get away.

questions.text: How much was the rent on Sara/Laura's home that she rented in Cedar Falls, Iowa?
questions.explanation:
$700/month.

	She rented this house next to Ben Woodward, played by Kevin Anderson, the man she ended up falling in love with.

questions.text: What kind of pie did Sara/Laura bake to take over to Ben's house for dinner?
questions.explanation:
Apple.

	They met because he caught her picking the apples off of the tree in his yard.  He told her that apple pie "sure would go good with the pot roast" that he was fixing the next evening.

questions.text: Ben taught English at the college in Cedar Falls, Iowa.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He taught dramatics at the college.  If you will recall, he takes Sara/Laura around and she tries on several different costumes and dances to Van Morrison's "Brown Eyed Girl".

questions.text: What did Martin do with Laura's wedding ring that he found in the bottom of their toilet?
questions.correct: he wore it on his pinky finger
options: he threw it across the room
he threw it in the trash
questions.explanation:
he wore it on his pinky finger.

	When he found that ring he knew that she was not dead.  It was then that he set out looking for her.

questions.text: What was the name of the song playing in the background at the party that Martin and Laura attended?
questions.explanation:
Close to You.

	The song was Maxi Priest's "Close to You".  It was a big hit in the summer of 1990.

questions.text: Marita Geraghty, who played Julie from the nursing home, played the role of Nancy Taylor in what 1993 comedy?
questions.explanation:
Groundhog Day.

	Marita played one of the many girls whom Phil Connors womanized in the hilarious 1993 film "Groundhog Day".
